docs.snippet: It was 75 years ago that Singapore, the island at the tip of the Malay Peninsula that had been key strategic outpost of Britain's colonial empire, fell to invading Japanese troops. The events live on in history books more than in memories. But for...
docs.lead_paragraph: It was 75 years ago that Singapore, the island at the tip of the Malay Peninsula that had been key strategic outpost of Britain's colonial empire, fell to invading Japanese troops. The events live on in history books more than in memories. But for Margaret Menz, the passage of years has not dulled the pain.

headline.main: Memorial Ceremony Marks Fall of Singapore to Japanese Troops
headline.print_headline: Memorial Ceremony Marks Fall of Singapore to Japanese Troops

docs.snippet: President Michel Temer's approval ratings are sinking as he pushes austerity measures through Brazil's Congress while the popularity of leftist former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is rebounding ahead of 2018 elections, an opinion poll showe...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Michel Temer's approval ratings are sinking as he pushes austerity measures through Brazil's Congress while the popularity of leftist former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is rebounding ahead of 2018 elections, an opinion poll showed on Wednesday.

headline.main: Brazil's Temer Popularity Slides, Lula's 2018 Chances Rise-Poll
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Temer Popularity Slides, Lula's 2018 Chances Rise-Poll
